Module downfall
Package net.dragondelve.util

Interface SaveManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleSaveManager
    public interface SaveManager
    Interface for any class responsible for loading, saving and keeping track of the last location to which the last load or to which last save was done.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void loadFrom​(java.lang.String pathname)
      Loads and applies the savegame from a given pathname and attempts to find, load and validate the rules that are referenced in the savegame.
      void loadFromLast()
      Loads and applies the savegame from last pathname used and attempts to find, load and validate the rules that are referenced in the savegame.
      void saveTo​(java.lang.String pathname)
      Formulates a new Savegame ba
      void saveToLast()
      Formulates a new Savegame based on the state of the Configurator and then saves it to the last pathname used.

    • Method Detail

      • loadFromLast

        void loadFromLast()
        Loads and applies the savegame from last pathname used and attempts to find, load and validate the rules that are referenced in the savegame.

      • loadFrom

        void loadFrom​(java.lang.String pathname)
        Loads and applies the savegame from a given pathname and attempts to find, load and validate the rules that are referenced in the savegame.
        Parameters:
        pathname - pathname to a savegame file.

      • saveToLast

        void saveToLast()
        Formulates a new Savegame based on the state of the Configurator and then saves it to the last pathname used.

      • saveTo

        void saveTo​(java.lang.String pathname)
        Formulates a new Savegame ba
        Parameters:
        pathname - pathname to a file in which the savegame data will be recorded.
